content: These settings will be effective for all of your spaces.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a bar title that displays whether settings are enabled or disabled, depending on the current location. It appears in a bar component when navigating to settings pages. The translated text should be clear and concise, indicating the status of the settings.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'spaces' in the English content refers to distinct areas or environments within a system or platform. 'Domenleriniz' translates to 'your domains,' which doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'spaces'. A more suitable translation would be something like 'məkanlarınız' (your spaces) or 'sahələriniz' (your areas/fields).

The translation 'Nämä asetukset tulevat käyttöön  kaikissa tiloissasi.' is a literal translation but could be improved for naturalness in Finnish.  'Tulevat käyttöön' can sound a bit awkward. A more common and natural phrasing would convey the 'effective' aspect more elegantly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nämä asetukset ovat voimassa kaikissa tiloissasi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Այս կարգավորումները արդյունավետ կլինեն ձեր բոլոր տարածքների համար:' is a literal translation and sounds slightly unnatural in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the application of the settings to all spaces.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Այս կարգավորումները կգործեն բոլոր ձեր տարածքներում:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ເຂດພື້ນທີ່' translates to 'area' or 'zone' which isn't the best fit for 'spaces' in the context of user-managed spaces. 'ເຂດ' is too general.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'ສະຖານທີ່' (sathan thi) which means 'location' or 'place' to better convey the meaning of 'spaces'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'ຈະມີຜົນໃຊ້ງານ' is a bit verbose. It means 'will have effect/use'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ຈະໃຊ້ໄດ້' (ja chai dai) which means 'will be effective' or 'will work'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ustawienia te zostaną zastosowane we wszystkich Twoich obszarach roboczych' is a bit literal and not the most natural phrasing in Polish. 'Obszary robocze' is acceptable but a more fluent option would convey the meaning more effectively. 'Spaces' can be understood more simply as 'przestrzeniach'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustawienia te zostaną zastosowane we wszystkich Twoich przestrzeniach.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මෙම සැකසීම් ඔබගේ සියලු ඉඩ සඳහා ඵලදායී වනු ඇත' doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of 'These settings will be effective for all of your spaces.' While 'ඵලදායී වනු ඇත' (phaladāyī vanu athā) translates to 'will be effective', it's a bit formal and indirect.  A more natural phrasing would better convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම සැකසීම් ඔබගේ සියලුම ඉඩ සඳහා බලපානු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly an error, 'සියලු' is often shortened to 'සියලුම' for better flow. Although 'සියලු' is acceptable, 'සියලුම' is more common in spoken Sinhala.

The translation 'Te nastavitve bodo uporabljene za vse vaše prostore' doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'These settings will be effective for all of your spaces.' 'Uporabljene' implies the settings are being used, rather than being in effect. A more accurate translation would imply they will be active or apply.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Te nastavitve veljajo za vse vaše prostore.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ова подешавања ће бити ефективна за све ваше просторе' isn't the most natural or common way to express 'These settings will be effective for all of your spaces' in Serbian. While technically correct, it sounds slightly formal and clunky. A more natural phrasing would be closer to 'Ова подешавања важе за све ваше просторе.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ова подешавања важе за све ваше просторе.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ova podešavanja će biti efektivna za sve vaše prostore' while understandable, isn't the most natural or idiomatic way to convey the English meaning. 'Effective' can be better translated to 'važiće' or 'imaće dejstvo' depending on the desired nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ova podešavanja važiće za sve vaše prostore.
